catalog_info.title: Principles and Advanced Topics in Clinical Trials
catalog_info.notes: Offered jointly with the School of Public Health as BIO 238.
catalog_info.prereq: Prerequisite: BIST 230 AND BIST 231 (may be taken concurrently)
catalog_info.description: This course focuses on selected advanced topics in design, analysis, and interpretation of clinical trials, including study design; choice of endpoints (including surrogate endpoints); interim analyses and group sequential methods; subgroup analyses; and meta-analyses.
